sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Note: **This article or section does not follow the Laptop page guidelines.** This article or section does not follow the Laptop page guidelines.

This article or section does not follow the Laptop page guidelines.

The HP Envy X360 15-en0000na was released in 2020. It has a Ryzen Mobile 7 4700U with Radeon (Renoir) Graphics and 16GB of DDR4 RAM.

Table content:
Hardware | PCI/USB ID | Working?
Bluetooth | 10ec:c822 | Yes
Webcam |  | Yes
Wireless | 10ec:c822 | Yes
Fingerprint reader |  | Untested
GPU | 1002:1636 | Yes
Audio | 1002:1637 | Yes
SD-card reader | 10ec:522a | Yes

sections.title: Installation
sections.content:
This laptop has Secure Boot enabled by default, with Windows 10 pre-installed.

See Dual boot with Windows for the common steps to ensure a good coexistence.

The NVMe drive is /dev/nvme0n1.

sections.title: Power management
sections.content: See Power management/Suspend and hibernate#Changing suspend method, the only working state is s2idle.

sections.title: Firmware
sections.content: fwupd does not support this device yet.

sections.title: Tablet mode
sections.content: This Laptop has a sensor built in to detect if it is in tablet mode. This has not yet been tested.

sections.title: Fingerprint sensor
sections.content: The Fingerprint Sensor can not be detected. It doesn't appear in the output of lsusb and libfprint doesn't work on this device.
